ObjexxFCL Supported Platforms

The ObjexxFCL is written in portable, standard-compliant C++ and should be compatible with modern hardware, operating systems, and compilers. Some C++11 features are used in the latest ObjexxFCL releases: contact Objexx if this creates an obstacle in using the ObjexxFCL.

It is known to work on modern hardware with these operating systems and current releases of these compilers:

Operating System Compiler
Linux (32 and 64 bit) GCC
Intel® C++
Windows® (32 and 64 bit) GCC
Intel® C++
Microsoft® Visual C++
Mac OS X GCC

The ObjexxFCL is likely to be compatible with recent releases of other standard-compliant C++ compilers.

Using current stable C++ compiler releases is strongly recommended.
